# Evolution of CO2 emission by country

In this notebook, I will show you some evolution of CO2 emission by country using Plotly.
source.66192312: As expected, UK is the biggest CO2 emitter during the 19th century. This isn't a suprise because they are the origine of the first industrial revolution.
source.1b19c2c9: We can see that China is the biggest emeter of CO2 in the world. It was in 2006 that china surpassed the United States. Even if it was interesting to see the evolution in CO2 emission for each country, I think that see the average CO2 emission per capita would be interesting as well. In this kind of ranking, I don't think that China will be first.
